The photo in question was flagged by Fac: 2. The image was found to be manipulated and altered, as reported by both Snopes and Gizmodo.
The original photo: taken by a Getty Images photographer, shows the Trump sons in 2005 at Donald Trump Jr.'s wedding reception at Mar-a-Lago.
In the manipulated image shared on socia: there are noticeable changes to Donald Trump Jr.'s eyes, upper lip, and teeth, as well as differences in Eric Trump's eyes and facial structure.
